HtmlTable Module¶

class epyk.core.html.tables.HtmlTable.Bespoke(report, recordSet, cols, rows, width, height, htmlCode, options, profile)¶
add(row, missing='', is_header=False)¶

Add a row to the table

Example simple_table.row_add({“column”: “value”})

Parameters

  • data – The row to be added to the table

  • missing – The data to put when a cell is missing

Returns

The python table

col(header=None, i=None)¶

Get the table column cells as a generator

Parameters

  • header – String.

  • i – Integer

property header¶

Get the header row. Returns none if missing

row(i, inc_header=False)¶

Get the table rows

Parameters

  • i – Integer. The column number

  • inc_header – Boolean. Default False

Returns

property tableId¶

Return the Javascript variable of the bespoke

class epyk.core.html.tables.HtmlTable.Cell(report, text, is_header)¶
set_html_content(htmlObj)¶

Set the cell content to be an HTML object

Parameters

htmlObj – Python HTML object

Returns

self, the cell object to allow the chaining

class epyk.core.html.tables.HtmlTable.Excel(report, recordSet, cols, rows, title, width, height, cellwidth, delimiter, htmlCode)¶
property tableId¶

Return the Javascript variable of the bespoke

property val¶

Property to get the jquery value of the HTML object in a python HTML object. This method can be used in any jsFunction to get the value of a component in the browser. This method will only be used on the javascript side, so please do not consider it in your algorithm in Python

Returns

Javascript string with the function to get the current value of the component
